评论概述: Great price for a great jacket
评论详情: This did not appear 'worn' or used.  I love the color (beige) and the fit is perfect. Even the sleeves are long enough.  I usually wear a size 6 tall and the small fits just right. It's puffy and warm.
It's nice enough but it's huge. I wear XS or S jackets and the XS was too large for me. I believe it's meant to have that oversized look, but still, it's huge.
